title: God of War Ragnarok’s Director Wants to Make Castlevania - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.22.22
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com to shop their Black Friday selections.

Blessing and Tim talk about what a Sony Santa Monica Castlevania could look like, Sony removing easy platinums, and big things poppin' in the Chinese games industry.

Go to http://shadyrays.com to shop their Black Friday selections.

Time Codes - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:40 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now. It’s our Pokemon and Somerville reviews PLUS an interview with Karen Fukuhara from The Boys and Callisto Protocol. That’s up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
A new Kinda Feudy is up on Patreon where Bless asks the guys to name one of Starfox’s buddies.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:34 - God of War Ragnarök’s director says he wants to work on Castlevania next - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:18:06 - Sony is removing Shovelware and Easy Platinum Games from PlayStation Store - Josh Coulson @ The Gamer
00:24:55 - Sony plans to expand incubator for Chinese games - Danielle Partis @ GiBiz
00:33:32 - Ad
00:34:40 -The hardest Tetris game is officially coming to consoles for the first time - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:42:40 - Ubisoft has confirmed that its games are returning to Steam - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:45:00 - The Xbox 360 controller is making a comeback - Chris Scullion @ VGC
